docs.snippet: A THIRTY-FIVE-DAY flying circuit of South America provides the tourist with a wide range of travel experiences, and Sunday in particular is usually a red-letter day. On our South American trip last summer, we spent four Sundays in four different...
docs.lead_paragraph: A THIRTY-FIVE-DAY flying circuit of South America provides the tourist with a wide range of travel experiences, and Sunday in particular is usually a red-letter day. On our South American trip last summer, we spent four Sundays in four different countries engaged in such varied pursuits as visiting Inca ruins, shopping in an Indian market, skiing in the Andes, picking the winners at a Montevideo race track and touring Brazil's new capital of Brasilia.

headline.main: SUNDAY IS A RED-LETTER DAY IN SOUTH AMERICA

docs.snippet: BOGOTA, Colombia, Sept. 10 -- The declining price level and market barriers encountered in international trade by Latin America's commodity exports are serious snags for the program of economic development of this area being discussed here in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BOGOTA, Colombia, Sept. 10 -- The declining price level and market barriers encountered in international trade by Latin America's commodity exports are serious snags for the program of economic development of this area being discussed here in the current interAmerican "Committee of Twenty-one" conference.

headline.main: LATINS CAUGHT IN PRICE SQUEEZE; Drop in Commodity Export Income Hinders Area's Development

byline.original: By JUAN de ONISSpecial to The New York Times
